title: The Dream (Week 1)
creator_credit: Colin Bromley, Todd Abbott and Seven Network Limited (Australia)
brief_description: A more lighthearted approach to the Olympic Games. Highlights from the television progam ‘The Dream with Roy and HG’ (John Doyle and Greig Pickhaver) which ran nightly for the duration of the Sydney Olympic Games. Includes highlights of events and interviews with popular Olympians - both past and present. This tape shows highlights of week one including Eric Moussambini’s historic solo 100 metre swim, the Russian Gymnastics, diving, rowing and judo finals.
